item.description:
Potlucks rule! So start thinking of what vegan delight you'd like to share with the group. As always, please contact me if you have any questions or suggestions.

The place: 4 Avalon Place #3
Worcester, MA

The time: 1-3
Remember, no parking on Avalon as it is a private street
and all spots are assigned. Parking is available on the side
streets.


Stephen
item.name: Worcester Vegan MeetUp & EatUp April Meetup
